body: Basing from comments, Im not reading this for the sake of my rehabilitated mind n hart

Shindol...
What to say, almost an experiment, have seen these type of stories happen in real life in some "cracolândias" out there, or some suburban areas in Brazil, that's sad as fuck, hope the girl who read these shit use it as an example of what no to do

Fucking hell, Emergence was bad enough for showing the decline of one girl, but now we got three more. We now got the prostitute, the blackmailed hostess/escort, and the porn star. And I know ShindoL likes to put in some realism with these depression/PTSD inducing stories, but fuck I didn't need to see a newborn get tossed in the toilet. Fuck everything. Emergence and this shit has already got me needing therapy, but the art just keeps bringing me back, but I can't even nut cause the depression kills my boner.

I don't know why Japanese ppl is so fucking into this 'pregnant' shit, it's such a fucking cock-block/buzzkill, i hate that shit, Four Leaf Lover is almost a perfect doujin but this whole thing towards pregnancy is just disgusting and it's not just Shindol, there's ALOT of great doujin/autors that gets fucked up midways because of that. In the end of the day this is a fucking cartoon why do they need to get pregnant or anything related? Just let them get 1000 creampies/nakadashis without getting pregnant, geez... @Trap-a-holic maybe it's because of that.

Can't believe this doujin is one of Shindol's least favorited in nhentai. I thought it'll have the same amount of fave with Emergence. Huh, guess nobody is interested with mind-break drugging 3 years ago.
At the end its pretty fucked up
